file_content.text: You are always welcome here, my friend.
Enter, my friends, and stand before me.
Enter, Jedi, and stand before me.
Enter, Lieutenant, and stand before me.
Enter and stand before me.
General Kashim reports that the Sith have been defeated. The Thul forces are scattered. Our troops are containing the enemy along the coast.
For this alone, your names will be recorded in the histories of House Organa! This is a victory!
The battle's over? There won't be a second wave?
Then we won?
Skirmishes continue, but we believe the storm has passed.
Congratulations.
Be grateful you're not kneeling before the Wolf Baron.
All thanks to me.
I'd sooner lose my head. But I am grateful to you.
Bring in the prisoner!
I will not beg. My allies will come for me.
You risked your life to save my people from this man's treachery. I put his fate in your hands.
He could've killed me, but he didn't. Make sure he's not harmed.
Treat him fairly.
I am glad to see there is honor left on this world.
You choose wisely. Take him away.
Execute him. He'll be an example to the other Thuls.
The baron must die.
As you wish.
You haven't won this war. The Empire grows stronger every day, and House Thul remains its greatest weapon!
Nonetheless, the men and women dead at the Wolf Baron's hands--their blood stains our honor.
House Thul has other leaders who will take the Wolf Baron's place. And there are other houses in this war, as well.
My friends... I ask you to act in House Organa's name as you travel this world. Will you represent our cause?
My friend... I ask you to act in House Organa's name as you travel this world. Will you represent our cause?
I can't pledge myself to you forever. But so long as your cause is just, I'll be at your side.
A Jedi must be unbiased.
My duty is to the greater good, not House Organa. But I'll do what I can.
I represent peace.
I'll do what I can, sir. But Havoc Squad has a job of its own to do.
The Republic comes first.
So it does. If I can ever help, call on me.
I'm sorry, Duke--but I came looking for a job, not a lifestyle.
I just wanted a reward....
Then receive all that you hoped for. The treasury is open.
I'm honored, my lord. I'll do anything I can.
Absolutely.
Once again, I am grateful.
As the Republic is grateful.
I'm not your servant.
You are defying the Republic. Understand--
It's alright. You've done more than enough.
You will always be welcome here. And the day will come when Alderaan sees peace!
Until then, feast, celebrate--and hope we live to see a kinder age.
The Sith are attacking as we speak. You must go!
The Wolf Baron awaits us. Let's not disappoint.
You have my personal thanks, Jedi. We will feast tonight, and ready ourselves for the next battle.
Havoc Squad has my personal thanks. We will feast tonight, and ready ourselves for the next battle.
You have my personal thanks. We will feast tonight, and ready ourselves for the next battle.
There's still much to do, my lord. I won't be resting.
Now's no time to celebrate.
Jedi don't often feast, my lord, and rarely under such unfortunate circumstances.
Now's no time to celebrate.
No time to rest while the enemy's out there. I'll stick with rations, sir.
I'm needed in the field.
I see. A word of advice? Armies are not inspired by a grim-faced commander. Show spirit and a lust for life, and....
Sounds nice, but I left my fancy pants on the ship.
Feasts aren't my style.
Like it or not, you've become part of my circle. The army needs to see you. They need inspiration.
I'd be honored to dine with you, my lord.
Thank you.
Good. We'll eat and drink and strategize, and show the world we still have hope.
Can I have cash instead?
The treasury isn't empty yet. And as I said, you have my thanks.
My lord? There's a call coming in on your secure channel.
Thank you, Haley. Put it through, General.
It's been a long time, my lord Duke. Who are your friends?
Nevermind. If they wish to speak to the Wolf Baron of House Thul, they'll do so themselves.
You ordered the land bombed and the turrets captured.
You lead the Thul army?
I did, yes.
I think we're starting on the wrong foot. Let's talk about this.
You're being rude, Duke.
Yes. Let's.
I don't need to talk to a "Wolf Baron," thank you.
I'll pass.
Then perhaps you should simply listen.
You may have retaken the Spears of Organa, but they served my purpose--scattering your people and sending them straight into my hands.
What are you saying, Baron?
I'm saying that House Thul has taken three hundred Organa citizens captive. I thought you'd want to know.
Make your demands. We're listening.
What do you want?
Threatening civilians is not going to save you.
You're making a big mistake.
You don't even know me, and you've judged me already. How unkind.
We don't need to hear any more of this.
Shut him off, Duke.
Talk, Baron, before my patience runs out.
I'd like to meet in person to civilly discuss the fate of my prisoners. I'm sending a time and coordinates now.
In the meantime, your people will be treated well. The incident with your son-in-law will not be repeated.
Damn him. Damn his eyes!
I suggest you remain calm. This is the Wolf Baron's trap.
I'm not a fool! But a ruler who can't protect his people is no ruler at all. I have to go.
I'm not afraid of the Wolf Baron. Allow me to handle this.
I'm going to that meeting.
You are Organa's best hope. But you will not go alone.
You have an idea?
You've saved us twice before. Now I turn to you again.
That's just stupid.
Don't worry. I'm not rushing off to be captured.
Lead the way, and I will follow. Sweep aside the Wolf Baron's black guard, his assassins. He wants to meet? Let us meet on even terms!
We'll rescue those people. And House Thul will fall.
We'll win this thing.
So it shall be.
I can go alone. You're better off in the estate.
I think you should stay here.
No. If the Wolf Baron thinks I stayed behind, he'll kill his hostages and withdraw.
House Thul is dead.
Let us hope it doesn't come to that.
House Thul will be massing its forces. I will prepare our troops while you confront the Wolf Baron.
Thank you, General. And you--I pronounce you paladins of House Organa, my beacons in the dark.
It is your valor I salute. Your word I believe. Clear the path, my friends, and let us look evil in the eye.
Thank you, General. And you--I pronounce you a paladin of House Organa, my beacon in the dark.
It is your valor I salute. Your word I believe. Clear the path, my friend, and let us look evil in the eye.
The Spears of Organa are back in our hands. My grandfather would be proud.
Our defenses are improved, but we are still vulnerable. Perhaps a temporary withdrawal....
I will not leave my troops behind, General. Do not suggest it.
If Thul takes the Spears of Organa, our house is doomed.
Welcome to Organa palace.
Find out everything he knows--about Thul and about the Empire.
He should be interrogated.
